r.s: Asynchronous and concurrent and distributed networking framework for PHP.
r.d: Asynchronous and concurrent and distributed networking framework for PHP. - event-driven - full asynchronous non-blocking - multi-thread reactor - multi-process worker - millisecond timer - async MySQL - async task - async read/write file system - async dns lookup - support IPv4/IPv6/UnixSocket/TCP/UDP - SSL/TLS encrypted transmission
r.n: - Fixed memory leak swoole_client synchronous mode occurs when the server closes - Fixed POST/Upload problem can not handle more than 8K - Added swoole_http_response->sendfile method for sending large files - Fixed swoole_client core dump when enable SSL/TLS encrypted - Added swoole_server->getSocket/swoole_client->getSocket - Fixed UDP large package in question Worker process occurs dispatch_mode = 1/3 deadlock - Added swoole_client->sleep/wakeup method for suspend/resume data reception event - Fixed UDP large package data is abnormal
